description:
Elle`s Fennekin is an Idol Pokémon who is regularly featured in the "Best 10 PokéVisions (ポケビジョン・ベスト10)" and it started off in idol Pokémon unit with Elle and they are now immensely popular. Ash Ketchum thought that Elle`s Fennekin was cute.
While on their way to Shoyo City, Ash Ketchum and his friends stopped at a Pokémon Center and watched PokéVision. The episode they watched featured Elle`s "Idol Life" (アイドルライフ) which was that week`s number one video.
name: Fokko (Elle)
